definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克，弄點兒鹹肉就着煎麪包片兒喫好不好？

sentences.english: My doctor told me not to eat fatty foods such as bacon or ham.
sentences.chinese: 我的醫生叫我不要喫油膩的食物，比如鹹肉或漢堡。

sentences.english: How do you like the steak served, wee - done or underdone?
sentences.chinese: 她用半生不熟的鹹肉和燒焦了的餅乾招待我們。

sentences.english: Can also use bacon instead of minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 也可以用鹹肉代替肉末。

sentences.english: “Hell, Nixon treated us better than this!” he roared—and demanded bacon, sausage, eggs and toast.
sentences.chinese: 提總是大喊着要鹹肉，香腸，蛋和麪包。

sentences.english: Toss the pancetta into a large pot, preferably a big, heavy dutch oven.
sentences.chinese: 將鹹肉碎放入一個大鍋內，最好是大的重的荷蘭烤盤。

sentences.english: He cooked us all a big breakfast of bacon and fried eggs.
sentences.chinese: 他爲我們每人做了一份有薰鹹肉和煎蛋的豐盛早餐。

sentences.english: Cheese and salt meat, should be sparingly eat.
sentences.chinese: 乾酪和鹹肉，千萬別喫夠。

sentences.english: Bacon is still expensive and boneless pork loins are not cheap either.
sentences.chinese: 鹹肉依然很貴，無骨的豬大排骨也不便宜。

sentences.english: He had bacon and eggs for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 他早餐吃了鹹肉和鴨蛋。

sentences.english: My doctor told me not to eat fatty foods such as bacon or hamburgers.
sentences.chinese: 我的醫生叫我不要喫油膩的食物，如鹹肉或漢堡包。

sentences.english: This is the first study to establish a direct connection between cured meat consumption and COPD.
sentences.chinese: 該研究首次證實，食用鹹肉與慢阻肺發生直接相關。

sentences.english: He pecked listlessly at his breakfast of egg and bacon.
sentences.chinese: 早餐時，他無精打采，只吃了一點雞蛋和鹹肉。

sentences.english: There was soup and fish, removed by boiled chicken and bacon .
sentences.chinese: 接在湯和魚之後，換上來的是煮雞和鹹肉。

sentences.english: I especially loved the use of pancetta at the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我特別喜歡在一開始就使用意大利鹹肉。

sentences.english: Lean meat can be larded to keep it moist in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 瘦肉上可加鹹肉片烤制以保持水分。

definition: Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
